chapter.title: Enriching log messages with external data
chapter.para: To properly interpret the events that the log messages describe, you must be able to handle log messages as part of a system of events, instead of individual information chunks. The &abbrev; application allows you to import data from external sources to include in the log messages, thus extending, enriching, and complementing the data found in the log message.
The &abbrev; application currently provides the following possibilities to enrich log messages.

listitem.para: You can add name-value pairs from an external CSV file. For details, see .
You can resolve the IP addresses from log messages to include GeoIP information in the log messages. For details, see .
